confuse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make someone feel that they cannot think clearly or do not understand
confuse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I understand the text but the diagrams are confusing me.
confuse.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to think wrongly that a person or thing is someone or something else
confuse.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: People might well confuse the two products.
